mean_cn: n. 独白，个人长篇演说
mean_en: a long speech given by a character in a story, movie, play, etc., or by a performer (such as a comedian)
word_etyma: mono单个，一个+logue说话→一个人说话→独白
sentence: The entire play was just a two hour monologue by one person; it was so boring!
sentence_trans: 整个演出就是一个人长达两小时的独白，太无聊了。
